document.full_text: in st. petersburg, a city with a lively music scene, a conductor wonders whether a 'tschaikowski' orchestra exists. roman leontiev, identified as the orchestra's music director, begs to differ.
document.title: conductor says orchestra is a phantom
lines_and_colors: in st. petersburg, a city with a lively music scene, a conductor wonders whether a 'tschaikowski' orchestra exists. roman leontiev, identified as the orchestra's music director, begs to differ.
